modal.header_description: Create a new character for your story
modal.info_message: Everything can be edited later. Some special sections can only be added after the character is created.
modal.description_placeholder: A determined warrior seeking revenge against the empire that destroyed her village. Skilled with swords and ice magic, she hides a gentle heart beneath her armor.
modal.height_placeholder: 5'9", Tall as a tower, Short and nimble
modal.skin_tone_placeholder: Pale as moonlight, Golden bronze, Deep ebony
modal.weight_placeholder: 154lbs, Muscular build, Light as a feather
modal.hair_placeholder: Long silver wavy hair, Fiery red mohawk
modal.eyes_placeholder: Violet eyes that glow in the dark, Heterochromia (one blue, one gold)
modal.face_placeholder: Angular face with a strong jawline, Delicate and youthful features
modal.distinguishing_features_placeholder: Lightning-shaped scar over left eye, Runic tattoos on arms, Curved horns
modal.no_species_warning: No species registered. Go to the Species tab to create one.
modal.personality_placeholder: Sarcastic and distrustful of strangers, but fiercely loyal to friends. Prefers action over words and struggles to express deep emotions.
modal.hobbies_placeholder: Collecting ancient weapons, playing lute in taverns, studying constellations and prophecies
modal.dreams_placeholder: Restore family honor, uncover the truth about their origins, unite the divided kingdoms
modal.fears_placeholder: Fear of losing control of powers, nightmares about the day their village was destroyed
modal.favorite_food_placeholder: Grandma's lamb stew, Caramel apples, Elven bread with honey
modal.favorite_music_placeholder: Ancestral battle songs, Soft harp melodies
modal.no_locations_warning: No locations registered. Go to the World tab to create one.
modal.no_organizations_warning: No organizations registered. Go to the Organizations tab to create one.

archetype.innocent_desc: Optimistic, pure, seeks happiness and safety
archetype.hero_desc: Courageous, determined, seeks to prove their worth
archetype.creator: Creator
archetype.magician_desc: Transformative, visionary, makes dreams come true

alignment.lawful_good_desc: Acts with compassion and honor, follows rules
alignment.neutral_good_desc: Does good without bias toward order or chaos
alignment.chaotic_good_desc: Believes in freedom and compassion above rules
alignment.lawful_evil_desc: Uses laws and order for selfish purposes
alignment.neutral_evil_desc: Purely selfish, without honor or chaos

validation.dreams_max_length: Dreams and goals must be at most 250 characters
